code: import*as actions from'./actionTypes';export var addCoin=function addCoin(data){return{type:actions.COIN_ADD,payload:{name:data.response.name,count:data.count,priceUsd:data.response.priceUsd,coinTotalPrice:data.coinTotalPrice,key:data.response.id}};};export var removeCoin=function removeCoin(id){return{type:actions.COIN_REMOVE,payload:{id:id}};};
